name: spoil
trans: v. Makes it tasteless and damaged

name: airfield
trans: n. Aircraft take-off and landing site

name: modern
trans: a. Modern, different from the past

name: Medusa
trans: N. Medusa (one of the snake-haired ghosts in ancient Greek mythology)

name: Gorgon
trans: n. One of the snake-haired female monsters (in ancient Greek mythology)

name: lonely
trans: a. Remote, off the beaten track

name: madam
trans: n. (honorific title for women) Mrs., Mrs.

name: unaware
trans: a. What you don't know, that shows observation

name: truant
trans: n. Children who have dropped out of school

name: figure
trans: n. Body shape (of a person); portrait

name: alibi
trans: n. Not at the scene of the crime

name: trap
trans: v. Falling in and getting into trouble

name: present
trans: v. Performance a. Attendance and attendance
